flashbackSetups: The museum tour was going smoothly until the guide whispered, 'Whatever you do, do not stare directly at the statue's eyes.' Then...
Everyone at the wedding froze when the best man stood up and said, 'Before I give my toast, there's something you all need to know.' Then...
The job interview was going great until the interviewer leaned in and asked, 'Can you keep a secret?' Then...
The family reunion was peaceful until Grandma opened her mysterious locked box and revealed...
The escape room was supposed to be fun until the door actually locked and the lights went out. Then...
The cooking class instructor smiled nervously and said, 'Whatever happens, don't open the oven.' Then...
The fortune teller's eyes went wide. She dropped my hand and whispered, 'You need to leave. Now.' Then...
My blind date was going perfectly until they looked at their phone and said, 'We have exactly three minutes.' Then...
The tour guide stopped the bus in the middle of nowhere and said, 'This is where it happened.' Then...
The pilot came on the intercom and said, 'Ladies and gentlemen, I need to be honest with you.' Then...
The dentist put down their tools, took off their mask, and said, 'We need to talk about what I found.' Then...
My new roommate seemed normal until I came home early and found them...
The self-driving car announced, 'Route recalculated. Final destination updated.' Then...
Grandpa's last words were cryptic: 'The treasure is hidden where...'
The tech support call was routine until the agent said, 'Sir, your webcam has been on this whole time.' Then...
The dinner party took a dark turn when the host clinked their glass and announced...
The Uber driver locked the doors and said, 'I know what you did last summer.' Then...
The therapy session was going well until my therapist started crying and said...
My DNA test results came back, and the letter simply said...
The magician's trick went wrong when the rabbit actually...
The yoga instructor stopped mid-pose and whispered, 'Nobody move. It's behind you.' Then...
The airplane bathroom door wouldn't open, and a voice from inside said...
My smart home assistant suddenly announced at 3am...
The company all-hands meeting went silent when the CEO revealed...
The haunted house actor broke character and screamed, 'That's not one of us!' Then...
